content:
Craft an item of type: red_banner
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_sign", "quantity": 6, "index": 16}, {"type": "flint_and_steel", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "diorite_wall", "quantity": 19, "index": 23}, {"type": "stone_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "lime_carpet", "quantity": 31, "index": 28}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "red_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 36}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 50, "index": 42}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]

thought: I need to craft a red banner, which requires red wool and sticks. I already have enough red wool, but I do not have any sticks. To craft sticks, I need to place two planks above each other in the crafting grid. I do not have any planks, so I will first need to craft them. Planks can be crafted from crimson hyphae, which I have one of in slot 38. Therefore, I will move the crimson hyphae into the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: red_banner
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_sign", "quantity": 6, "index": 16}, {"type": "flint_and_steel", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "diorite_wall", "quantity": 19, "index": 23}, {"type": "stone_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "lime_carpet", "quantity": 31, "index": 28}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "red_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 36}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 50, "index": 42}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]

thought: I have successfully crafted the crimson planks, and now I need to use them to craft sticks. I will move the planks from the crafting slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11), and then use them to craft the sticks.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: red_banner
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "crimson_sign", "quantity": 6, "index": 16}, {"type": "flint_and_steel", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "diorite_wall", "quantity": 19, "index": 23}, {"type": "stone_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "lime_carpet", "quantity": 31, "index": 28}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "red_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 36}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 50, "index": 42}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: I need to craft a stick before I can make the banner. To do so I need to place 2 planks in the crafting table. I will start by moving one of the crimson planks to the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: red_banner

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1
